channel.title: Public Appeal for Dryder
channel.description: # Public Appeal for Player: Dryder This player was given a three day suspension for Gamethrowing early in a game. His logs are presented here. Full and unclipped. Here is the reason displayed: > Going out of your way to gamethrow because you don't like class. Previous suspensions for racism (else only 1d) This player was also given a 3 day suspension for Racism back in November. 400+ games played. ----- [details="Racism Quoted from that game +some dev bashing (November 3rd) - Dryder is Ray - King"] (Alive) White Power [1] (Ray - King): alright (Alive) White Power [1] (Ray - King): we gotta get rid of the blacks (Alive) Eggs [2] (VeggieSpider - Alchemist): 1 youre totally getting banned lol (Alive) Eggs [2] (VeggieSpider - Alchemist): devs are very SJW [/details] ------- [details="Game Logs - Early Game Throwing (December 4th) - Dryder is Ray - Court Wizard"] **Logs** [color=#ff9803] (System to Disagree To Agre [9] (Sheepish - King)): You are allied with the Blue Dragon.
